data.name: Axiom Verge Making-Of Documentary
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


Artbook and Poster PDF Files

If you have purchased this documentary, the associated PDFs can be downloaded from the Software section of your Steam Library. If you have received this documentary as a gift, please click here to add them to your Steam Software Library.


#label_about_the_series

Over five hours of behind the scenes content with the developer of Axiom Verge, Tom Happ, and his business/marketing mastermind, Dan Adelman. Videos include a documentary, an extended interview with Tom Happ, a "let's play" by Tom and Dan, and a speedrun by GVirus with commentary by Tom and Dan.

As a special bonus, this also nets you PDF versions of the world map, poster, and "The Art of Axiom Verge" that were included with the physical console releases.
data.about_the_game:
Over five hours of behind the scenes content with the developer of Axiom Verge, Tom Happ, and his business/marketing mastermind, Dan Adelman. Videos include a documentary, an extended interview with Tom Happ, a "let's play" by Tom and Dan, and a speedrun by GVirus with commentary by Tom and Dan.

As a special bonus, this also nets you PDF versions of the world map, poster, and "The Art of Axiom Verge" that were included with the physical console releases.
data.short_description: Over five hours of behind the scenes content with the developer of Axiom Verge, Tom Happ, and his business/marketing mastermind, Dan Adelman. Includes map, poster, and art book PDFs as well.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
